though and my noggen doesnt have a long memory span

----- Original Message -----
From: Tim Burke
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Sent: Saturday, September 30, 2000 8:52 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Niv's graphic???


Something I noticed last night... can someone confirm this?

During some downtime last night I was doing this twist hymn, niv's, mana
song till others wear off and I noticed that when I did Niv's I flung my
arms out as if casting a spell instead of strumming my lute?

I am using a gupsy lute... the 5%, +5 MR lute. I later confirmed that
everytime I played niv's with that lute... I flung my arms out. I will test
it with other strings, but another bard got the correct graphic when using
his 7-string...

Has this been around for awhile or what?

Kerouac Dharmabum
lvl 50
Rodcent Nife
